ValidationRule.description: Visit Template, Default Management Type, User Policy, Valid From and Valid Thru can't be edited if the Active is checked.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND ( NOT(ISNEW()), cgcloud__Active__c, OR ( ISCHANGED(cgcloud__Visit_Template__c), ISCHANGED(cgcloud__Default_Management_Type__c), ISCHANGED(cgcloud__User_Policy__c), (ISCHANGED(cgcloud__Valid_From__c) && PRIORVALUE(cgcloud__Valid_From__c) < TODAY()), (ISCHANGED(cgcloud__Valid_Thru__c) && PRIORVALUE(cgcloud__Valid_Thru__c) < TODAY()) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Visit Template, Default Management Type, User Policy, Valid From and Valid Thru can't be edited if the Active is checked.
